## IS\_INSTANCE\_OF() function

Check if a value is an instance of a specific constructor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function IS_INSTANCE_OF<T extends GenericConstructor>(value: unknown, constructor: T): value is InstanceType<T>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

unknown


</td><td>

The value to check.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

constructor


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The constructor to check against.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

value is InstanceType&lt;T&gt;

True if the value is an instance of the constructor, false otherwise.
